page.title: 06A Typical child's Saturday
page.content: in Hurworth-on-Tees. I wake up at about 8am on a Saturday and usually read a book or comic in bed.Then I watch the television in my room.After breakfast of toast, cereal and tea I usually go shopping in town (Darlington) with my Mum at about 10.30am.Sometimes my Dad will go into town if he requires something for the car.We stay in town until 1.30pm then we return home for lunch.On Saturday afternoons, Dad and I sometimes watch sport on the television.Alternatively, I play with my best friend.If it's a pleasant afternoon, many boys in the neighbourhood meet on the green where we have a game of football/cricket. After tea, I play outside until 8.20pm.Then I come in and watch television until 10.30pm when it is bedtime.
